presentationColumns.name: # of Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.# of Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Opportunities Across Stages
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.# of Opportunities Across Stages

presentationColumns.name: # of Progressed Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.# of Progressed Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: % Opportunities by Stage
presentationColumns.description: The Progressed Opportunity Percentage. This metric is computed as follows: # of Progressed Opportunities/# of Opportunities Across Stages
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.% Opportunities by Stage

presentationColumns.name: % Progressed
presentationColumns.description: The % of Opportunities in a stage of the total Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.% Progressed

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Days in Stage
presentationColumns.description: The average number of days in a Sales stage. This metric is computed as follows: sum of days in stage/# of Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.Average # of Days in Stage

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Days Stalled in Stage
presentationColumns.description: The average number of stalled days in a Sales stage. This metric is computed as follows: sum of stalled days/# of Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.Average # of Days Stalled in Stage

localization.localizationKey: Average # of Days Stalled in Stage

presentationColumns.name: Win Rate
presentationColumns.description: The rate of winning Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won opportunities/# of Won+Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.Win Rate

presentationColumns.name: Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: The rate of losing Opportunities.This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Lost opportunities/# of Won+Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.Loss Rate

presentationColumns.name: Conversion Rate
presentationColumns.description: The rate of converting Opportunities.This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won Opportunities/# of Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Stage Progression.Conversion Rate
